attributes.action: clarify now whether the Government would back a future candidacy of Tony Blair for the newly proposed EU Presidency post under a ratified Lisbon Treaty if Mr Blair gives no indication of being prepared to relinquish part time paid employment with JP Morgan Chase and Zurich Insurance should he successfully contest the EU job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition seeks to clarify whether Gordon Brown's Government would back any candidacy of Tony Blair for the full time EU Presidency post proposed under the Lisbon Treaty if Mr Blair does not relinquish his part time paid employment with JP Morgan Chase, which has Iraq reconstruction business interests, and Zurich Insurance on taking the post.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
